DOC.brief_title: Levofloxacin In The Treatment Of Children With Recurrent And/or Persistent Acute Otitis Media
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , active-comparator , multicenter study consist 3 phase : Pretreatment ( Screening ) Phase , Treatment Phase , Posttreatment Phase . Subject eligibility determine screen visit base sign symptom acute otitis medium ( e.g. , middle ear effusion , acute inflammation , acute purulent otorrhea ) criterion recurrent and/or persistent acute otitis medium . Eligible subject randomize drug dispense study coordinator instruct parent subject importance revealing assign therapy subject 's evaluator . Each subject evaluator remain blind subject 's therapy throughout study . Clinical assessment perform blind evaluator several time point throughout study use evaluate efficacy . Safety evaluate throughout study assessment adverse event change physical examination ( include musculoskeletal examination evaluation joint ) , vital sign , clinical laboratory finding . Supplementary safety evaluation musculoskeletal adverse event perform throughout study . All subject enroll study take least 1 dose levofloxacin amoxicillin/clavulanate eligible rollover long-term surveillance study primarily focus musculoskeletal system . The purpose study demonstrate non-inferiority levofloxacin compare amoxicillin/clavulanate clinical response end therapy infant child recurrent and/or persistent acute otitis medium . Either levofloxacin 10 mg/kg twice daily 10 day ( maximum daily dose 500 mg ) amoxicillin/clavulanate ( 14:1 ) 45 mg amoxicillin/kg twice daily 10 day ( maximum daily dose 3600 mg amoxicillin ) . Both study drug give orally liquid suspension formulation
